A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I've been a die hard Star Wars fan since I was 5 years old. I watched all of the movies at least 10 times. I saw this twice and theaters and the second time was better than the first! Personally I still think The Force Awakens was a better film but I still thoroughly enjoyed this! My only disappointment with The Last Jedi is that it creates more questions than it answers! Hopefully all of those questions will be answered in Episode 9! Highly recommend this film to all new and old Star Wars fans!
